beers.name: Blue Buck Ale
beers.description: The Blue Buck is a legendary beast, featuring a robust, malt-forward body underpinned with crisp northwest hops. Well balanced and highly drinkable.

beers.name: Lucky Lager
beers.description: Lucky has been quality brewed in the tradition of a classic Canadian lager since 1934. With no preservatives, only 5.0% alcohol, Lucky is a lighter tasting, easy drinking beer that has stood the test of time.

beers.name: Nütrl Vodka Soda
beers.description: No carbs. No sugar. No sweetener. No preservatives. No additives. Nütrl Vodka Soda is a wildly light, easy drinking, totally refreshing, sugar free, additive free, 5% alcohol, ready to drink, premium craft vodka soda. It’s the perfect change up from the usual sugary-sweet cooler or high calorie, super-filling beer. Available in grapefruit, lemon, lime, and cranberry.

beers.name: Phillips iOTA Pale Ale
beers.description: iOTA Pale Ale is light gold in colour, crafted for smooth and highly balanced malt and hop profiles. This delicious brew brings rounded honey and cereal notes, straightforward mouthfeel, and deliciously floral hops. This ale strikes a harmony between drinkability and flavour.

beers.name: Phillips iOTA Hazy IPA
beers.description: iOTA Hazy IPA is low on bitterness, full of citrus and juicy fruit notes. Our house malted barley lends a hand in creating a smooth sip and helps carry that tropical hazy hop profile.

beers.name: Red Racer Street Legal Pilsner
beers.description: Street Legal is traditionally brewed before having the alcohol removed in our state-of-the-art cross-flow filtration system.  This allows us to preserve the delicious flavour of our craft beer and produce a product with only 0.5% alcohol.

beers.name: Red Racer Street Legal IPA
beers.description: Street Legal is traditionally brewed before having the alcohol removed in our state-of-the-art cross-flow filtration system.  This allows us to preserve the delicious flavour of our craft beer and produce a product with only 0.5% alcohol.

cocktails.name: Manhattan
cocktails.recipe: 1.5 ounce bourbon, 1 ounce sweet vermouth, 2 dashes angostura bitters, 2 dashes orange bitters, 2 amareno cherries

cocktails.name: Old Fashioned
cocktails.recipe: 1.5 ounces bourbon, 0.5 ounce rye, 1/2 ounce water, 1/2 teaspoon organic cane sugar, 2 dashes angostura bitters, 2 amareno cherries, smoked orange garnish (subject to availability)

cocktails.name: Maple Old Fashioned
ingredients: grade A very dark maple syrup
cocktails.recipe: 1.5 ounces bourbon, 1.5 ounces rye, 2 dashes angostura bitters, 2 dashes dillon's orange bitters, smoked orange garnish (subject to availability)

cocktails.name: Boulevardier
cocktails.recipe: 1 1/4 ounces bourbon, 1 ounce campari, 1 ounce sweet vermouth, fresh squeezed orange juice, orange garnish

cocktails.name: Negroni
cocktails.recipe: 1 1/4 ounces gin, 1 ounce campari, 1 ounce sweet vermouth, fresh squeezed orange juice, orange garnish

cocktails.name: Sazerac
cocktails.recipe: 1 ounce bourbon, 1 ounce rye, 1 ounce cognac, 1/8 ounce absinthe, 3 dashes peychaud's, 2 dashes angostura, 1 teaspoon sugar, lemon twist

cocktails.name: Vodka Soda
cocktails.recipe: 1.5 ounces vodka, sparkling water to taste

cocktails.name: Sidecar
cocktails.recipe: 1 1/2 ounces cognac, 3/4 ounce cointreau, 3/4 ounce lemon juice, lemon twist

cocktails.name: French 75
cocktails.recipe: 3 ounces champagne, 1 ounce gin, 1/2 ounce simple syrup, 1/2 ounce lemon juice

cocktails.name: French 77
cocktails.recipe: 3 ounces champagne, 1 ounce elderflower liqueur, 1/2 ounce lemon juice

spirits.name: Long Table Distillery London Dry Gin

wines.name: Horseshoe Cellars Riesling, 2020
wines.description: Horseshoe Cellars are dedicated to celebrating terroir in the Niagara Peninsula as expressed through Riesling - one of the region's finest varietals. Focuses on intensity, complexity, and balance, this wine is crafted to be a true representation of time and place.
